PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Approximation algorithms for Data Placement Problem
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: In this problem we have to find a proper placement of data in different caches, which are having some capacity such that the total cost of storing the object in different caches and the cost of retrieving the objects from the caches are minimized. Studying the local search based methods for approximation algorithms and applying them on the data placement problem.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Fuzzified Delay Constraint Shortest path problem
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
1) Implementation of the problem in Crisp version.
2) Implementing the simple fuzzy for cost and delay one at time.
3) Finally the code for Trapezoidal Intuitionistic Fuzzy Number for Cost parameter.
4) Derivation of the Centroid formulae for Trapezoidal Intuitionistic Fuzzy Numbers.
5) Derivation of Hesitancy Checker for Trapezoidal Intuitionistic Fuzzy Numbers.
Studied, implemented and analyzed the various variants of Range Minimum/Maximum Query Problem. Involved data structures like Segment tree, sparse table and deque.

1.	Implemented the SPML algorithm for learning a Mahalanobis distance metric from a network 
        such that the learned distances are tied to inherent connectivity structure of the network. 
2.	Then applied this algorithm on Facebook data and Wikipedia data. 
3.	Improved the running time of the algorithm by applying the principle component analysis. 
4.	To study about the basics of Machine Learning, successfully completed a course on “Coursera”.

HONOR & AWARD.Title: 12 times in Top 20 in India On Codechef Long Constets
